text: Allah Taalaa farmaye ga jo firqay tum say pehlay guzar chukay hain jinnaat mein say bhi aur aadmiyon mein say bhi unn kay sath tum bhi dozakh mein jao. Jiss waqt bhi koi jamat dakhil hogi apni doosti jamat ko laanat keray gi yahan tak kay jab iss mein sab jama hojayen gay to pichlay log pehlay logon ki nisbat kahen gay kay humaray perwerdigar hum ko inn logon ney gumrah kiya tha so inn ko dozakh ka azab dugna dey. Allah Taala farmaye ga sab hi ka dugna hai lekin tum ko khabar nahi
